alert.note: Alert for Albany; Rensselaer; Saratoga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 11:59AM EST until December 20 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at Troy. * WHEN...From this evening to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, the river is at moderate flood stage. Water reaches mobile homes along the river front in Lansingburgh. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 18.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 25.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Troy Flood Stage: 21.5 Observed Stage at Mon 11 am: 18.9 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 19.3 Mon 7 pm 21.7 Tue 1 am 24.0 Tue 7 am 25.4 Tue 1 pm 24.7 Tue 7 pm 23.6 Wed 1 am 22.7 Wed 7 am 22.0 Wed 1 pm 21.4 Wed 7 pm 20.9 Thu 1 am 20.5 Thu 7 am 20.1 &&
